verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: will] make a visit to the UK in July , the White House has confirmed .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: make] [ARG1: a visit to the UK] [ARGM-TMP: in July] , the White House has confirmed .
Donald Trump will make a visit to the UK in July , the White House [V: has] confirmed .
[ARG1: Donald Trump will make a visit to the UK in July] , [ARG0: the White House] has [V: confirmed] .
